meanings.sent1: The small bug was very killable by the shoe.
meanings.sent2: The lion was a killable threat to the villagers.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy bunny looked so killable, but it was actually a tough survivor.
meanings.sent4: The fragile vase on the edge of the table seemed killable with just a touch.
meanings.sent5: The dark forest at night felt full of killable creatures lurking in the shadows.

meanings.sent1: The zombie was slow and very killable by the survivors.
meanings.sent2: The dragon was a formidable opponent, but still killable with the right strategy.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's arch-nemesis thought he was invincible, but he was actually quite killable.
meanings.sent4: The evil sorcerer's power seemed immense, yet he was ultimately killable by the chosen hero.
meanings.sent5: The ancient curse on the tomb made the mummy inside seem especially killable.
